ComicInfo.Title: The Pit of Death [Part 1]; Chapter V - Ship of Death; The Blood Book; A Vampire Stalks Melrose Abbey
ComicInfo.Summary: This flashback Transylvania issue recounts a memory when a townsman named Lupescu tried to rally his fellow citizens into destroying Dracula. But the only one who ends up suffering is Lupescuâ€™s wife!
